channel.title: 100ERRORS how to fix (MYSQL)(for pro)
channel.description:
i download a server but its mysql and idk much about that almost evver1 say you misted "}" or "{" what i most do plz can anny1 help me plz?

item.title: 100ERRORS how to fix (MYSQL)(for pro)
item.dc:creator: @Graham Graham
item.description:
@Graham wrote:

The first error is this:

client.java:124: ‘else’ without ‘if’
if(true) goto _L2; else goto _L1

It’s because of the goto the decompiler has produced which isn’t legal Java not a missing bracket.

Read full topic

item.title: 100ERRORS how to fix (MYSQL)(for pro)
item.dc:creator: @Killer-99-pkz Killer-99-pkz
item.description:
@Killer-99-pkz wrote:

Do this… When you start to decompile it get ready to catch the scroll bar and drag it to the top and find the first error must be missing a Bracket ( } ) or you just need to stop using jadint.

Read full topic

item.title: 100ERRORS how to fix (MYSQL)(for pro)
item.dc:creator: @Graham Graham
item.description:
@Graham wrote:

This looks like it has been decompiled, and the decompiler hasn’t sorted out all the code (as can be seen by the goto which is not a valid Java statement - it is only reserved). You’ll need to sort out those problems, and I believe the rest of the problems are caused by it.

Read full topic
